document.full_text: in a series of reports in the 1990s, mr. van der stoel painted a searing portrait of the human rights abuses under saddam hussein in iraq.
document.title: max van der stoel, diplomat who uncovered hussein's abuses, dies at 86
lines_and_colors: in a series of reports in the 1990s, mr. van der stoel painted a searing portrait of the human rights abuses under saddam hussein in iraq.
